title: Restaurant Order API
description: Developed a full-stack restaurant management system that allows customers to browse menus, place orders, and track their order status in real time
The platform enables restaurant staff to manage inventory, update menus, and monitor incoming requests through a secure admin dashboard
Built the backend using FastAPI with a SQL database for data storage and RESTful API endpoints
Achieved 100% unit-test coverage with Pytest, implemented structured logging, and integrated pipelines
Designed and implemented a modern React + Tailwind CSS frontend with responsive and intuitive interface

title: EcoCommute
description: Built a full-stack web app to optimize commute routes based on sustainability and cost
Integrated real-time emissions data and calculated carbon savings per trip
Designed a clean UI with Tailwind and interactive map-based route selection
Collaborated with an AI model to generate route explanations and recommendations

title: Black Ice Tips
description: Developed a full-stack coaching marketplace for Rainbow Six Siege players to sell tips and services
Built with Node.js, MongoDB, EJS, and Express
Enabled user profiles, session listings, and secure login
Increased user engagement by streamlining the coaching request process
Designed with scalability and community-driven support in mind

title: Visual Forensics
description: A platform to help use AI and visualize digital forensics
Leverages artificial intelligence to analyze and visualize digital forensic evidence
Makes it easier to process and understand complex forensic data

title: Interactive CS Textbook
description: Migrated and extended an open-source Runestone textbook to XML-based PreTeXt
Converted RST content to PreTeXt format with coding challenges and auto-graded assessments

title: Forty Knives and Forks
description: Developed a comprehensive restaurant discovery and budget management platform for the 2025 CCI Startup Hackathon
Built full-stack application with Node.js, MongoDB, and React for restaurant discovery with real-time availability
Implemented intelligent budget tracking system with visual progress indicators and transaction history
Integrated Google Gemini AI for personalized recipe recommendations based on user preferences
Designed and implemented MongoDB database schema, seeding scripts, and backend-frontend API integration
